summary: Benning Bass Club website with tournament management, event listings, standings table, and cost acknowledgement modal
architectural_notes: Standings table uses hardcoded data (24 anglers + 1 unknown entry) - admin editing to be implemented later
Standings table has sticky header, zebra striping, gold/green leader highlight, colored move arrows (green ↑, red ↓, gray —), colored badges for notes
Standings table is horizontally scrollable on mobile devices
Numeric columns in standings table are right-aligned, Angler column is left-aligned

existing_features.title: Replace the existing standings table on the Standings page (frontend/src/pages/Top10.tsx) with a new 'Top 25 Standings' table containing these exact columns in order: Rank, Angler, Adj Pts, Behind Leader, Events, Move, Notes. Populate with the 24 anglers plus 1 'Unknown / Name Error' entry as specified in the user's data.
Add section title 'Top 25 Standings' and subtitle 'Adjusted standings through January 2026' above the standings table.
Implement sticky table header that remains visible when scrolling through the standings table.
Apply zebra striping to table rows for improved readability.
Highlight the first place row (Rank 1, Cox, Clint) with a subtle gold or green accent to distinguish the leader.

Display Notes column values as small colored badges with different styles for: 'Leader', 'Tied', 'Perfect attendance', 'Missed 1 event', 'Missed 2 events', 'Missed multiple events', 'Partial season', and 'Needs correction in source sheet'.
Color-code Move column arrows: green for upward movement (↑), red for downward movement (↓), and gray for no movement (—).
Right-align all numeric columns (Rank, Adj Pts, Behind Leader, Events) and keep the Angler column left-aligned.
Enable horizontal scrolling on mobile devices for the standings table to ensure all columns remain accessible on smaller screens.
Remove the average fish size tracker component from the homepage (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx).

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace Standings page table with Top 25 Standings table with specific columns and design features
Remove average fish size tracker from homepage
